isis.stitle: 3300 HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS AND BUMPER - Install - Fender-Mounted Cross-View Mirrors

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. MIRROR BASE MOUNTING BOLTS, NUTS AND LOCK WASHERS

step1.para: With an assistant holding the mirror base assembly, locate and align the base mounting holes and the fender mounting holes. Insert the mounting bolts through the fender assembly, place the fender reinforcing plate over the bolts, install lock washers and nuts. Tighten until snug.
Install the mirror bracket attachment clamps to the mirror main support bracket.
Locate the mirror / fender support bracket, and align with mounting hole in fender.
Insert the mounting bolts through the bracket end and fender section. Install the flat washer and lock nut on the underside of the fender section and hand tighten ( Figure 70, Item 1).
Place the opposite end of support bracket in attachment clamp ( Figure 71, Item 4) on mirror main support bracket.
Insert bolt, lock washer and nut and tighten
Locate and align the mirror support bracket end mounting hole with the mounting hole in the side surface of the hood Figure 71, Item 1) assembly.
Insert the mounting bolt through the bracket end and hood section. Install the flat washer and lock nut.
Place the opposite end of support bracket in attachment clamp on mirror main support bracket.
Tighten all nuts. ( See Torque chart for values)
Follow the same procedure for the opposite side mirror assembly.
